Name: Eye Care
Description: Our eye care service includes of various procedures abd diagnostics of your eyes ensuring your eyes are fit. Regular check ups are available along with the core 5 steps of eye care. Our doctors also provide eye exercises as an addition.

Name: Dry Eye Surgery
Description: Dry Eye is a very common eye problem and we perform the dry eye surgery with utmost carefulness. During the procedure it is mandatory for us to maintain proper hygiene and provide you the best service .

Name: Cornea Transplant
Description: The Cornea transplant surgery has a critical rate but in our platform we have performed each and every one successfully. For the past several years, we have performed numerous surgeries of cornea replacement with zero failures till date.

Name: Retina Repair
Description: Retina repair is by far one of the most successful stories of ours and we certainly can prove it to you. Retina repair is crucial which is why we are trained enough to perform it efficiently.

Name: Vision Check
Description: We perform compulsory vision check before any kind of further prescribing. Be it minor problem or major, we always perform this check for the sake of diagnosting.

Name: Laser Surgery
Description: Laser Surgery or Lasic is the most successful operation of our company and we can guarantee it's progress with full confidence. By far this is one of the most popular procedures of our era. Which is why we strive to be better at it.
